about_the_game:
Supporting small indie artists, Arcane Treasures: Trading Card Game brings players to a cute & whimsical fantasy world where rivalling factions of animal characters fight to uncover fantastical riches!

Gameplay
AT:TCG is played as a 2-player game with both players racing to uncover all of their 8 'Treasure' cards before the opponent does. They can bring in animal characters to help their cause & do battle! Play happens with a pre-built deck of 50 cards and 8 player-chosen Treasure cards. Players are matched up with another player on Steam online, or if no players are available they will play against a CPU. An internet connection is required.

Collections
Show off cards you pull from booster packs or earn through challenges to your friends! AT:TCG uses the Steam Inventory service to manage the cards you own, meaning your collection is in safe hands!

Events
Participate in regular events & prove your might and mettle to earn prizes! Ranked Challenge is the first regular event to reach Arcane Treasures: TCG - seeing players fight to earn the most Ranked Points over an event period - but more will be on the way!

Player Feedback
The development process is heavily rooted in player feedback, with great respect held in the views of the player. By participating in the Discord, you can have your say! But don't just take our word for it, feel free to ask members of the community who have given in feedback!

Supporting Indie Artists
Arcane Treasures and those involved with its development have always been rooted in the indie world, and always will be. Except for placeholder artworks during early development stages (which are steadily being replaced) all artwork is sourced from small, independent artists, and as the game grows it is committed to finding further ways to support independent artists.

If you're an artist and you'd like to get involved, please get in touch through the email attached to the Steam store page.

short_description: Build a whimsical deck of cartoon animals to battle foes & uncover special treasures in this cute but competitive online Trading Card Game! Collect trading cards featuring indie artists' works, open booster packs, and complete challenges to expand your collection!
